scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:prepare && npm run build:validate
scripts.build:clean: echo 'Cleaning build artifacts...' && rm -rf dist/ build/ .nyc_output/ coverage/
scripts.build:prepare: echo 'Preparing build...' && mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist/ && cp package.json dist/ && cp README.md dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:validate: echo 'Validating build...' && node -c dist/server.js && echo 'Build validation successful'
scripts.build:lint: echo 'Linting JavaScript files...' && find src/ -name '*.js' -exec node -c {} \;
scripts.build:full: npm run build:check-deps && npm run build:lint && npm run build:test && npm run build
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run build:full && npm run build:install-prod
scripts.deploy:docker: npm run build:docker && npm run build:docker:run
